keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our economy is going strong. Our economic policy has delivered more jobs, lower taxes, the highest wages in ten years, and the highest levels of investment in our roads since the 1950s.
We will build a fairer, more sharing society by reducing poverty. We will build a fairer society where success is based on merit.
We will build a more united nation that champions the freedoms that our country holds dear.
Britain is a great, global, trading nation – one of the world’s largest economies. We will be an outward-looking Britain that is confident on the world stage.

mentions.candidate: Steve Baker has proved himself a strong, independent and local voice for Wycombe, and a true advocate for our schools, town centre and local businesses. Steve's focus since moving to Wycombe has been on Chepping View Primary Academy and International Levy Foundation.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote for Theresa May and the Conservatives to represent Britain in the Brexit negotiations. We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.
issues.economy: Our economy is going strong. Our economic policy has delivered more jobs, lower taxes, the highest wages in ten years, and the highest levels of investment in our roads since the 1950s. IMF GDP forecast of nearly 2% growth for the UK through 2022.
issues.government: Only Theresa May and the Conservatives can offer: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest. We will end the wasteful, weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

community.content: Only Theresa May has the plan and the leadership to deliver the right deal for Britain abroad and a better deal for ordinary working people here at home.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steve Baker is a professional aerospace and software engineer with business and RAF experience. Steve is also a volunteer for the Conservative Party and an outspoken advocate of Conservative values, including the Union.

quotes.text: We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.

examples: The UK was the fastest growing economy in the G7 in 2016, comparable to the USA in 2017. IMF GDP forecast of nearly 2% growth for the UK through 2022.
Our economic policy has delivered more jobs, lower taxes, the highest wages in ten years, and the highest levels of investment in our roads since the 1950s.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest
Build a more united nation that champions the freedoms that our country holds dear.
We will be an outward-looking Britain that is confident on the world stage.
Fairer society where success is based on merit.
Steve Baker has proved himself a strong, independent and local voice for Wycombe, and a true advocate for our schools, town centre and local businesses.
Steve's focus since moving to Wycombe has been on Chepping View Primary Academy and International Levy Foundation.
Vote for Theresa May and the Conservatives to represent Britain in the Brexit negotiations.
Our economic policy has delivered more jobs, lower taxes, the highest wages in ten years, and the highest levels of investment in our roads since the 1950s.
Only Theresa May has the plan and the leadership to deliver the right deal for Britain abroad and a better deal for ordinary working people here at home.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest. We will end the wasteful, weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.
We will build a more united nation that champions the freedoms that our country holds dear.

examples: We will end the wasteful, weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.
